text: Ngozi Ezeocha (born 12 October 1973) is a former footballer. She played as a defender for the Nigeria women's national football team. She played with the team at the 1991 FIFA Women's World Cup and 1995 FIFA Women's World Cup. == Honours == Individual * IFFHS All-time Africa Women's Dream Team: 2021 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:1991 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:1995 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:Association football defenders
title: Ngozi Ezeocha
